dcterms:creator: K. Katevas
H. Haddadi
L. Tokarchuk
R. G. Clegg
dcterms:description: A dataset containing unconstrained natural one-to-one and group interactions collected using mobile sensing technology, specifically through Bluetooth Smart (BLE) beacons, accelerometer, and gyroscope data.
dcterms:title: Unconstrained natural one-to-one and group interactions
